MM2.metadata: NERSC Nansen Environmental and Remote Sensing Center
FORTH Foundation for research and Technology
Oceans > Ocean Acoustics > Acoustic Tomography > HIDDEN

Acoustic Data from the Tomography array will be collected from 2008. Two low frequency sources, one on each side of the Fram Strait, will transmit sound at a center freqeuncy of 250 Hz and a band width of 100 Hz. A vertical array with upto 16 hydrophones will record the arriving signal. Thereafter the data will go through pre-processing (detection og arrival peaks, estimation of traveltimes ect) before it goes into inversion algorithms and assimilation schemes. We expect to provide averaged profiles of temperature between the source and receiver pairs with increasing accuracy with depth.
